Description: Tiraz fragment, woven in dark blue silk; decorated with two lines of pseudo-Kufic inscriptions (yellow on a blue background and beige on a red background) edged by friezes by stylised vegetal interlacing in yellow on a red background, and framed by two large bands of stylised vegetal interlacing and animal motifs in yellow on a red background; lower end decorated with parallel bands in red and yellow on blue background and yellow on a red background; both selvedges (simple) are preserved. Warp: silk, blue and red, S, 24/cm Weft: silk, beige, light blue, dark blue, yellow and red, I, 34/cm
